description: Lists job runs based on a set of parameters.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The ID of the application for which to list the job run.

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: An optional filter for job run states. Note that if this filter contains multiple states, the resulting list will be grouped by the state. (string) ---

nested_items.name: jobRuns
nested_items.description: The output lists information about the specified job runs.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the application the job is running on.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the job run.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The optional job run name. This doesn't have to be unique.

nested_items.name: mode
nested_items.description: The mode of the job run.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the job run.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who created the job run.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the job run was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the job run was last updated.

nested_items.name: executionRole
nested_items.description: The execution role ARN of the job run.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the job run.

nested_items.name: stateDetails
nested_items.description: The state details of the job run.

nested_items.name: releaseLabel
nested_items.description: The Amazon EMR release associated with the application your job is running on.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of job run, such as Spark or Hive.

nested_items.name: attempt
nested_items.description: The attempt number of the job run execution.

nested_items.name: attemptCreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time of when the job run attempt was created.

nested_items.name: attemptUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time of when the job run attempt was last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The output displays the token for the next set of job run results. This is required for pagination and is available as a response of the previous request.
